name: Peermont D'oreale Grande at Emperor's Palace

reviews.text: Very beautiful and with incredible facilities. In the Emperor´s Palace complex, with a huge casino and other two 3 stars hotels, D´oreale Grande is a 5 star hotel. It has a great spa, wonderful swiming pool, nice restaurant and a warm decoration. The rooms are very nice and well decorated with all the facilities of a 5 star hotel.
reviews.title: Beautiful and great hotel

likes.disliked: — Problem with internet in business center

reviews.text: 5 minutes from de International Airport. Great location, great place.
reviews.title: Fit for the Emperor!

reviews.text: We only stayed in this fantastic hotel for one night between flights from the US to Cape Town. Let me tell you what a beautiful facility it is! Yes, it is located next to the casino but there are no influences from the casino on the hotel (i.e. - no gaming machines in the common areas). The pictures of the suite we stayed in tell the whole story! Breakfast the following morning was fit for a king. You name it they have it! The other couple we were traveling with stayed in a standard room which was also well appointed and crisp with a very comfortable bed! Great place to stay! Plus the grounds are immaculate!
reviews.title: Great place

description: Peermont D'oreale Grande at Emperors PalaceDiscover untold luxury and regal comfort...the 5-star Peermont D'oreale Grande hotel at Emperors Palace is conveniently located next to OR Tambo International Airport in Johannesburg. The hotel features 196 elegant rooms and suites all lavishly furnished in superior style. The opulent surroundings are complimented with state-of-the-art facilities for added ease and comfort. Dine at the elegant Aurelia's restaurant, indulge your senses at Octavia's Sensorium health and beauty spa or sip on a cocktail while watching the African sunset kiss the earth goodnight at Neptune's Pool Bar. Guests also have access to the casino, dining and entertainment facilities of the resort. If meetings, conferences, events or weddings are a focus, Emperors Palace presents the ultimate venue. The hotel features (196 rooms) with 140 Classic rooms, 29 Deluxe rooms, 11 Superior suites, 10 Executive suites, 2 Premier suites, 2 Presidential suites and 2 Special assistance / universal rooms. Smoking and non-smoking rooms are available. Check-in after 15h00 / Check-out before 11h00.
